Simon Cowell Steven Tyler , who will turn 63 next month, has done much of the heavy lifting for` Idol' this season, Simon Cowell Caramanica writes,`` helping keep the show within striking distance of last season's ratings and ensuring that even though certain things have been lost in transition, the show still has a steady center.''

Some speculate Eric Schmidt will remain executive chairman only temporarily before pursuing a career in the public sector, a field in which he has previously demonstrated interest. He jumped, I don't think he was pushed, said Ken Auletta , author of Googled.`` My suspicion is that he won't stay that long.''
